sentences.english: You will surprise everyone with your no nonsense approach to life and everything you do.

sentences.english: They worked vigorously and speedily and planted three thousand young trees in two days.

sentences.english: Because vigorous and resolute, gives the impression is generally very hard.

sentences.english: It takes time to develop the habit of taking action.
